detailedSummary: Basic colors in German: rot (red), blau (blue), grün (green), gelb (yellow), schwarz (black), weiß (white), grau (gray), braun (brown), orange (orange), rosa (pink).
whyItMatters: Mastering Colors: Rot, Blau, Grün, Gelb is essential for building a strong foundation in german - these basic concepts are the first building blocks for all future language learning.
